snippet: PRYOR--Andrew James. 1919-2016. Andrew was born in Manhattan. He worked for Grumman for 42 years. He was a talented artist, kind, and respected for his intellect and integrity. He died peacefully, surrounded by his loving family. He will be laid to rest in St. Charles Cemetery in Farmingdale. A celebration of life will be held at a future date. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PRYOR--Andrew James. 1919-2016. Andrew was born in Manhattan. He worked for Grumman for 42 years. He was a talented artist, kind, and respected for his intellect and integrity. He died peacefully, surrounded by his loving family. He will be laid to rest in St. Charles Cemetery in Farmingdale. A celebration of life will be held at a future date. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PRYOR, ANDREW JAMES
